AT.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
AT.description: Geh mit Nuna und dem Fuchs auf die epische Suche nach der Ursache für einen ewigen Schneesturm, der das Überleben ihres Volkes bedroht. Never Alone ist ein atmosphärischer Puzzle-Platformer, der zusammen mit den Iñupiat, den Ureinwohnern Alaskas, auf Basis einer traditionellen, über Generationen überlieferten Geschichte entwickelt wurde. Steuere im Einzelspielermodus beide Charaktere oder spiele mit einem Freund. Durchquere die frostige Tundra, springe über tückische Eisschollen, schwimme durch Unterwasserhöhlen und stelle dich bekannten und fremdartigen Feinden. Fast 40 Älteste, Geschichtenerzähler und Mitglieder des Volkes der Iñupiat haben an dem Spiel mitgearbeitet, das auf mehr als 75 „Beste Spiele des Jahres 2014“-Listen steht und 2015 bei den BAFTA Games Awards als „Best Debut Game“ ausgezeichnet wurde. Exklusiv auf der Wii U™ gibt es 20+ kulturelle Artefakte aus der Kollektion der Smithsonian Institution zum Sammeln, jedes mit hochaufgelöstem Foto und spannenden Informationen über die Urvölker Alaskas.

AU.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
AU.description: Experience the epic journey of Nuna and fox as they search for the source of an eternal blizzard that threatens the survival of everything they have ever known. Never Alone is an atmospheric puzzle platformer developed in collaboration with the Iñupiat, an Alaska Native people, drawn from a traditional story that has been shared across the generations. Guide both characters in single-player mode or play cooperatively with a friend as you trek through frozen tundra, leap across treacherous ice floes, swim through underwater caverns and face enemies both strange and familiar. On over 75 "Best of 2014" lists, and winner of "Best Debut Game" at the 2015 BAFTA Games Awards, nearly 40 Alaska Native elders, storytellers and community members contributed to the making of the game. Collect 20+ Wii U™-exclusive Cultural Artifacts that feature beautiful hi-res images and compelling background information drawn from the collections of the Smithsonian Institution.

BG.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
BG.description: Experience the epic journey of Nuna and fox as they search for the source of an eternal blizzard that threatens the survival of everything they have ever known. Collect 20+ Wii U™-exclusive Cultural Artifacts that feature beautiful hi-res images and compelling background information drawn from the collections of the Smithsonian Institution.

BE.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
BE.description: Voyagez en compagnie de Nuna et du renard à la recherche de la source du blizzard éternel qui menace la survie de tout ce qu'ils ont jamais connu. Never Alone est un jeu de plateforme atmosphérique développé en collaboration avec les Iñupiat, un peuple originaire d'Alaska, tiré d'un conte traditionnel transmis de génération en génération. Guidez les deux personnages en mode Un joueur ou coopérez avec un ami pour franchir la toundra glaciale, sauter sur de traîtres blocs de glace, nager dans des cavernes sous-marines et affronter des ennemis, étranges comme familiers. Figurant sur plus de 75 listes de "Meilleur jeu de 2014" et vainquer du prix "Meilleur premier jeu" aux BAFTA Games Awards 2015, ce sont près de 40 membres de la communauté, conteurs et anciens natifs de l'Alaska qui ont contribué à la réalisation de ce jeu.

ES.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
ES.description: Acompaña a Nuna y al zorro en su épico viaje en busca del origen de una ventisca eterna que amenaza la supervivencia de todo lo que conocen. Never Alone es un cautivador juego rompecabezas de plataformas desarrollado en colaboración con el pueblo iñupiat, nativo de Alaska, según una historia tradicional que se ha compartido durante generaciones. Guía a los dos personajes en el modo para un jugador o juega con un amigo en el modo cooperativo para recorrer la tundra, saltar sobre peligrosos témpanos, nadar por cavernas submarinas y enfrentarte a enemigos tanto extraños y como conocidos. En más de 75 listas "Mejor del 2014" y ganador del premio "Mejor estreno" de los BAFTA Games Awards 2015, casi 40 ancianos, narradores y miembros de comunidades de Alaska han contribuido en la creación del juego. Exclusivo para Wii U™, recoge más de 20 artefactos culturales de las colecciones del Instituto Smithsonian, cada uno con una imagen en alta resolución e interesante información de la cultura nativa de Alaska.

IT.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
IT.description: Accompagna Nuna e la volpe in un viaggio leggendario, alla ricerca dell'origine di una bufera senza tempo che minaccia la sopravvivenza del loro mondo. Never Alone è un gioco su livelli basato su rompicapi atmosferici, sviluppato in collaborazione con gli iñupiat, un popolo nativo dell'Alaska, e tratto da una storia della loro tradizione popolare. Guida i due personaggi in modalità giocatore singolo o gioca in cooperativa con un amico addentrandoti nella tundra gelata, saltando su insidiose banchine di ghiaccio, nuotando in grotte sommerse e affrontando nemici inconsueti e al tempo stesso familiari. Il gioco, presente in oltre 75 liste "Best of 2014", e vincitore del premio "Best Debut Game" ai BAFTA Games Awards del 2015, è stato realizzato grazie al contributo di quasi 40 nativi dell'Alaska, tra cui anziani, narratori e membri della comunità. In esclusiva per Wii U™ potrai raccogliere 20+ reperti culturali delle collezioni dell'Istituto Smithsonian, ognuno con un'immagine HD e interessanti informazioni generali sulla cultura dei nativi dell'Alaska.

LT.description: Experience the epic journey of Nuna and fox as they search for the source of an eternal blizzard that threatens the survival of everything they have ever known. NL.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
NL.description: Ervaar de epische reis van Nuna en de vos als ze op zoek gaan naar de oorzaak van een eeuwige sneeuwstorm die de overleving van alles wat ze liefhebben bedreigt. Never Alone is een sfeervolle platformpuzzel ontwikkeld in samenwerking met de Iñupiat, de oerbewoners van Alaska, en gebaseerd op een traditioneel verhaal dat al jaren van generatie op generatie wordt doorgegeven. Bestuur beide personages in het speltype voor één speler of speel samen met vrienden als je over bevroren toendra's reist, over gevaarlijke ijsschotsen springt, door onderwatergrotten zwemt en het opneemt tegen zowel bekende als onbekende vijanden. Aan dit spel dat meer dan 75 'Beste van 2014' in de wacht heeft gesleept en winnaar is van 'Best Debut Game' op de 2015 BAFTA Games Awards, hebben meer dan 40 oudsten, verhalenvertellers en leden van de gemeenschap uit Alaska meegewerkt. Verzamel in een spel exclusief voor de Wii U™ meer dan 20 culturele artefacten uit de collecties van de Smithsonian Institution, elk prachtig weergegeven en voorzien van boeiende achtergrondinformatie uit de Alaskacultuur.

NZ.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
NZ.description: Experience the epic journey of Nuna and fox as they search for the source of an eternal blizzard that threatens the survival of everything they have ever known. Never Alone is an atmospheric puzzle platformer developed in collaboration with the Iñupiat, an Alaska Native people, drawn from a traditional story that has been shared across the generations. Guide both characters in single-player mode or play cooperatively with a friend as you trek through frozen tundra, leap across treacherous ice floes, swim through underwater caverns and face enemies both strange and familiar. On over 75 "Best of 2014" lists, and winner of "Best Debut Game" at the 2015 BAFTA Games Awards, nearly 40 Alaska Native elders, storytellers and community members contributed to the making of the game. Collect 20+ Wii U™-exclusive Cultural Artifacts that feature beautiful hi-res images and compelling background information drawn from the collections of the Smithsonian Institution.

PT.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
PT.description: Experimente a jornada épica de Nuna e a raposa, que buscam a fonte de uma nevasca eterna que ameaça a sobrevivência de tudo que eles conhecem. Never Alone é um platformer quebra-cabeça atmosférico desenvolvido em colaboração com os Iñupiat, um povo nativo do Alasca, de uma estória tradicional que tem sido compartilhada por gerações. Guie os personagem em modo jogador único, ou jogue cooperativamente com um amigo viajando pela tundra congelada, saltando banquisas de gelo traiçoeiras, nadando em cavernas submersas e encarando inimigos estranhos e conhecidos. Em mais de 75 listas de "Melhor de 2014" e vencedor do "Melhor Jogo Debut" no 2015 BAFTA Games Awards, contribuíram na criação do jogo jogo quase 40 anciões nativos do Alasca, contadores de estórias e membros da comunidade. Exclusivo no Wii U™, colete 20+ Artefatos Culturais das coleções do Smithsonian Institution, cada um apresentando uma linda imagem em alta resolução e informações secundárias cativantes da cultura nativa do Alasca.

RU.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
RU.description: Окунитесь в эпическое путешествие Нуны и песца, стремящихся найти источник непрекращающейся метели, которая может разрушить весь известный им мир. Never Alone — волшебный платформер с головоломками, разработанный в сотрудничестве с инуитами, коренным народом Аляски, и основанный на традиционной истории, передающейся из поколения в поколение. Веди обоих персонажей в режиме одиночной игры или совместной игры с другом, прокладывая им путь через ледяную тундру, вероломные льдины и подводные пещеры и сражаясь как с известными, так и с незнакомыми врагами. Игра вошла в более 75 списков «Лучшие за 2014 год» и победила в номинации «Лучшая дебютная игра» Премии Британской Академии в области видеоигр 2015. В создании участвовали более 40 старейшин, рассказчиков и членов общины. Играя на Wii U™, соберите более 20 культурных артефактов из коллекций Смитсоновского института, к каждому из которых прилагается качественное изображение и интересные факты из культурной жизни коренного населения Аляски.

SE.description: Experience the epic journey of Nuna and fox as they search for the source of an eternal blizzard that threatens the survival of everything they have ever known. Collect 20+ Wii U™-exclusive Cultural Artifacts that feature beautiful hi-res images and compelling background information drawn from the collections of the Smithsonian Institution.

RO.name: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
RO.description: Experience the epic journey of Nuna and fox as they search for the source of an eternal blizzard that threatens the survival of everything they have ever known. Never Alone is an atmospheric puzzle platformer developed in collaboration with the Iñupiat, an Alaska Native people, drawn from a traditional story that has been shared across the generations. Guide both characters in single-player mode or play cooperatively with a friend as you trek through frozen tundra, leap across treacherous ice floes, swim through underwater caverns and face enemies both strange and familiar. On over 75 "Best of 2014" lists, and winner of "Best Debut Game" at the 2015 BAFTA Games Awards, nearly 40 Alaska Native elders, storytellers and community members contributed to the making of the game. Collect 20+ Wii U™-exclusive Cultural Artifacts that feature beautiful hi-res images and compelling background information drawn from the collections of the Smithsonian Institution.
